attributes.action: Limit the education curriculum to benefit student  engagement and mentality!
attributes.additional_details: Throughout the COVID-19 crisis students and parents alike have adapted and we have seen how hard it is for students to learn at home because of a lack of materials we need a more student approach instead of grades before students . Though the UK GCSES are just 1 part of your future but your true future is your heart that’s what leads to you where you want to be ! Education is not a ethos of military action it’s about developing a person and we need a curriculum for life not a robot!
attributes.background: I want the UK government to limit what school aged children learn . Throughout the COVID-19 crisis parents up and down the country have had an eye-opener into our education system and have seen the stupid system we learn from . We do not need to learn about coordinates , angles , PETAL paragraphs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain content of the national curriculum, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
